title: [IDEA] UNSEALED SPELLBOOK BUT WITH CHAMPIONS
body:
I made a post like 5 minutes ago about some stupid gamemode about changing abilities but hear me out:

Unsealed spellbook, but with champions instead of summoner spells. You can change your champion instead of spell in the middle of the game.

replies.body: Oh yeah just lemme pick an early game bully who falls off and then swap to a late game hyper carry after. Love it.
